name: Online Gift Voucher - Cockburns of Leith
description: Our gift vouchers are perfect for those occasions when you want to send a friend or loved one a gift of wine, but leave it up to them to choose from our fantastic selection here on our website. Choose a value and enter your personal message to the lucky recipient. Please note: the gift voucher is sent to the recipient by email as soon as you checkout. If you want to print the voucher out, or send it at a later date, you can enter your own email address in the “Recipient Info” section. You’ll then receive the voucher into your own inbox, and can print it or forward it later as desired. Standard minimum order quantities of 6 bottles apply online.

name: Torres Natureo Garnacha Syrah De-Alcoholised Wine - Cockburns of Leith
description: Torres Natureo Garnacha Syrah De-Alcoholised has a dark cherry red colour. Intense and sensual, with exquisite fruit aromas (blackberries) and a touch of spice (clove). Soft, supple and delicious on the palate.Discover the exquisite allure of Spanish Dry Torres 2020 Garnacha Syrah Natureo, a beautifully crafted alcohol-free red wine that promises a taste sensation like no other. Made from a harmonious blend of Garnacha and Syrah grapes, this remarkable wine captures the essence of Spain’s sun-kissed vineyards and transports it straight to your glass.As you pour this vibrant, ruby-red wine, you’ll be greeted by an enticing bouquet of ripe red fruits, mingled with delicate hints of vanilla and spice. On the palate, indulge in a symphony of flavours, as succulent notes of juicy cherries, plums, and blackberries dance gracefully with subtle hints of liquorice and clove. The elegant tannins provide a velvety texture, while the perfectly balanced acidity ensures a refreshing and satisfying finish.

name: Torres Natureo Muscat De-Alcholised Wine - Cockburns of Leith
description: Torres Natureo Muscat De-Alcholised wine is the fruit of much research, placing us at the forefront of high-quality dealcoholized wine in 2008. After fermentation, only the alcohol is removed from this 100% Muscat of Alexandria, thus preserving its full aroma and flavour.The exquisite Torres Natureo Muscat – a delightful non-alcoholic wine that captures the essence of traditional Muscat without the alcohol content. This elegant, de-alcoholised wine boasts an enticing pale straw-yellow hue, revealing its freshness and youth.Savour the vibrant aromas of green apple, peach, and citrus, enhanced by delicate floral undertones, as you raise your glass. Indulge in the harmonious balance of sweetness and refreshing acidity on the palate, delivering a crisp and invigorating taste experience.

name: Torres Natureo Rosé De-Alcoholised Wine - Cockburns of Leith
description: Natureo Rosado is rosé wine with the alcohol removed, made from a coupage of Syrah and Cabernet Sauvignon varieties produced by Bodegas Torres in Catalonia.Natureo Rosado is made like any other rosé wine. The grapes go through a 24-hour maceration to extract a light colour. Alcoholic fermentation takes place in stainless steel tanks at a controlled temperature for 15 to 20 days. The resulting wine then undergoes a process to remove the alcohol.Bodegas Torres is a well-known, hundred-year-old family winery that, as well as producing wines in different parts of the world and having an international presence, spends some of its time recovering native varieties and producing high quality alcohol-free wines so that those who can’t drink alcohol can still enjoy the essence of wine. These are accessible and very well made wines.
duplicateWith: Torres Natureo Muscat De-Alcholised Wine - Cockburns of Leith

name: Noughty Blanc Dealcoholised Chenin & Chardonnay - Cockburns of Leith
description: Noughty Blanc is a dealcoholised white wine from South Africa, made from Chenin Blanc and Chardonnay grapes. Notes of yellow apple, lime and chamomile are present on the nose, with aromas of honeysuckle, citrus fruit and jasmine on the palate. Elegant balance of acidity and fruitiness. Beautifully crafted Chardonnay/Chenin Still White Wine from South Africa. <0.5% ABVProduced using 55% Chenin Blanc and 45% Chardonnay grapes harvested from dry-land farmed vineyards in the Western Cape region. The vineyards are strategically planted on south-west facing slopes to capture cool breezes from the Atlantic Ocean and cold Benguela current. Deep soils from decomposed granite, clay rich, with good drainage.With 14 days fermentation at 14-15°C, the grapes and juice are handled reductively to prevent oxidation and lock in fruitiness. The wine is left on lees for 2 months to add complexity. The wine is then dealcoholized by way of a gently spun cone technology. This is done under vacuum and at low temperature to ensure that the wine retains its distinctive body, colour and flavour. Vintage: Non-VintageVarietal: 55% Chenin Blanc / 45% ChardonnayVineyards: The grapes are harvested from dry-land farmed vineyards in the Western Cape region, where the vines are not trellised and are planted as bush vines. The vineyards are strategically planted on south-west facing slopes to capture cool breezes from the Atlantic Ocean and cold Benguela current. Deep soils from decomposed granite, clay rich, with good drainage.Winemaking: With 14 days fermentation at 14-15°C, the grapes and juice are handled reductively to prevent oxidation and lock in fruitiness. The wine is left on lees for 2 months to add complexity. The wine is then dealcoholized by way of a gently spun cone technology. This is done under vacuum and at low temperature to ensure that the wine retains its distinctive body, colour and flavour.Pairing: Great alternative to any elegant alcoholic white wine to be paired accordingly.

name: Noughty Dealcoholised Sparkling Chardonnay - Cockburns of Leith
description: Noughty Dealcoholised Sparkling Chardonnay has an elegant pale colour with a crisp and ripe apple scent accompanied by a touch of sweetness.Non-alcoholic, vegan, organic and halal. Noughty non-alcoholic organic vegan sparkling Chardonnay has been dealcoholized to retain the rich flavour of this beautifully crafted bottle.With 2.9g of sugar per 100ml, it has almost half the sugar content of other non-alcoholic sparkling wine. And with just 14 calories per glass, it’s the perfect answer to a hangover free celebration. Non-VintageVarietal: 100% organic ChardonnayVineyards: Sandy and calcareous vineyards located in southern Spain.Winemaking: Traditional winemaking in stainless steel vats for a further dealcoholization by vacuum distillation with aroma recovery. The wine is then lightly carbonated.Pairing: Great alternative to wine for aperitif and party nibbles, as well as with all manner of cuisine for those who choose not to drink alcohol.

name: Noughty Dealcoholised Sparkling Rosé - Cockburns of Leith
description: Noughty Dealcoholised Sparkling Rosé, made from Tempranillo grapes.Beautiful classic rosé in colour with a scent of freshly picked berries. The balance between sweetness and acidity is in perfect harmony.Non-alcoholic, vegan, organic and halal. Noughty Rosé non-alcoholic organic vegan sparkling has been dealcoholized to retain the rich flavour of this beautifully crafted bottle.With 4g of sugar per 100ml, it has almost half the sugar content of other non-alcoholic sparkling. And with just 18 calories per glass, it’s the perfect answer to a hangover free celebration. Non-VintageVarietal: 100% organic TempranilloVineyards: Sandy and calcareous vineyards located in southern Spain.Winemaking: Traditional winemaking in stainless steel vats for a further dealcoholization by vacuum distillation with aroma recovery. Four hour maceration. The wine is then lightly carbonated.Pairing: Noughty Sparkling Rosé is a celebration in itself and really sings with salted and spicy nibbles as well as complementing Asian food and a wide variety of dishes for those choosing something elegant without alcohol.

name: Noughty Rouge Dealcoholised Syrah - Cockburns of Leith
description: Noughty Rouge is a dealcoholised Syrah from South Africa. A deliciously well-balanced red wine that is deep ruby red in colour with hints of ripe red fruit, crushed black pepper, dried rose petal and candied cherries integrated with French oak tannins. Noughty Rouge has been dealcoholized to less than 0.5% ABV and yet retains the rich flavour of this beautifully crafted bottle.With just 14 calories per glass and only 2.5g of sugar per 100ml, it’s the perfect alternative to your usual alcoholic red wine. Vintage: Non-VintageVarietal: 100% SyrahVineyards: Produced with Syrah grapes from dryland farmed vineyards in Darling, South Africa. The grapes are grown in strategically selected sites, which get the warm sunny and cooling effect of the Atlantic Ocean. Deep soils from decomposed granite and rich clay help to provide good drainage.Winemaking: Dealcoholized to 0.5% ABV using a gently spun cone technology under vacuum and at low temperature to ensure that the wine retains its distinctive body, colour and flavour. Noughty Rouge is aged on a blend of 3rd and 4th fill barrels and French/American oak staves for 8 -10 months.Pairing: Great alternative to any elegant alcoholic red wine to be paired accordingly.
